changelog:
Updated build to Project+ v3.1.5 
This updates the Dolphin build to mainline Dolphin, implementing 7+ years worth of upgrades! 
A fresh install is highly recommended instead of updating through this, but can be done. 
Please take note of your settings if you decide to update directly! 

WARNING: Your aspect ratio setting will be changed to the wrong setting after the update; go to Graphics > General and set it to P+ widescreen to fix it.
